name: My Robo-Dog
description:
My Robo-Dog

My Robo-Dog is a 2d puzzle game. You have a cute little robot dog that will help you solve puzzles and really loves to play with balls. 

W, A, S, D to move

Right Click to throw the ball

You can only activat red buttons

Your dog can only activate blue buttons

All buttons on the level should be activated for the door to open

You can only go through red walls

Your dog can only go through blue walls
